subject: Real Estate
title: iBuyers: Algorithms That Buy Your Home
description: A short lesson to help you apply iBuyers: Algorithms That Buy Your Home.

hook.text: Opendoor will make you a cash offer on your home in 24 hours. No agent, no showings, no haggling.

buildup.text: iBuyers use algorithms to estimate home values, make instant cash offers, then resell for a profit.

discovery.text: At their peak, iBuyers purchased over 5% of homes in cities like Phoenix, disrupting the traditional market.

twist.text: Zillow's iBuyer arm lost $881 million and shut down. Even algorithms can't predict housing prices reliably.

climax.text: iBuyers trade convenience for accuracy. Speed comes at the cost of the best possible sale price.

punchline.text: Algorithms buy homes fast. They don't always buy them right.

quiz.question: What happened to Zillow's iBuyer business?
options: It lost $881 million and shut down
